tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sales_data (
    product_id INT,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    sale_date DATE,
    sale_quantity INT,
    sale_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE sales_data (
  sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  sale_date DATE,
  sale_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  customer_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE sales (
  sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT NOT NULL,
  sale_date DATE NOT NULL,
  units_sold INT NOT NULL,
  revenue DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);
